judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Arnold.
Mr. Justice Drew dissents,
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry A. Estep, with him Harry I. Glide, for appellant.
J. E. Ealson, Assistant District Attorney, with him Artemas G. Leslie, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Billingsley, Appellant.
Argued May 26, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearns, JJ.
reargument refused September 30, 1947.
Harry A. Estep, with him Harry I. Glide, for appellant.
J. E. Ealson, Assistant District Attorney, with him Artemas G. Leslie, District Attorney, for appellee.
July 29, 1947:
